name: LegionellaPresenceByUrineAntigenOrDNA
title: Legionella Presence by Urine Antigen or DNA
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for laboratory tests conducted to identify Legionella pneumonia by urine antigen or DNA.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element in the QDM category of Laboratory Test, Performed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that describe laboratory tests conducted to identify Legionella pneumonia by urine antigen or DNA.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
